website_summaries.verdict: A durable ceramic serving tray that adds a festive touch to your holiday party.
pros: Festive snowman and bird design looks nice on display
Snowman is beveled, not just painted on
cons: Some complaints of a messy paint job

customer_reviews.title: WISH AMAZON WOULD LOOK IN TO USA MADE STUFF  !!!.  😢.
customer_reviews.text: Quality stinks . Rocks back and forth on my counter. Lopsided as can be. Got this last minute just for a small plater for Christmas. If I return it like I SHOULD , then I won't have a small Christmas plate. I guess I will keep cause just use once a year. I'll put up with it. But this is what you get from China!!!! Wish I could find quality USA made!!! UPDATE......After thinking about this purchase for a couple of hours I AM returning. Shouldn't have to settle for junk.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Love my new table runner!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a BEAUTIFUL and classy table runner! It turned our dining room table into an inviting holiday experience! I am a snowman fan; we also have the salt and pepper shakers and a snowman tree skirt. The material of this runner is quality, velvety and soft. And the snowmen are well made and pleasing to the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J. Rief

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This Precious Moments snowman cookie jar looks just as adorable in person as on the screen. I am glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Bird color not like photo
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, but the Robin is not the color shown in the product pictures. It's more of a reddish clay kind of color. It's too bad, because they were able to get the stripe on the hat a bright red, but the bird really is a disappointment. There's also part of the bird on the cup received that isn't even painted.
customer_reviews.author: realmx2

customer_reviews.title: The box was a little worse for wear but the inside contents were in perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was a little worse for wear but the inside contents were in perfect condition and my grandma loved it!
customer_reviews.author: J Malone

customer_reviews.title: Broken card holders
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 boxes of the place card holders. Almost all of them had broken holders. The metal part that holds the card was not secured to the ceramic part. Very disappointed, had to return them all.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Cross

customer_reviews.title: This cookie jar is so cute!
customer_reviews.text: So glad that I purchased this cookie jar! It is even cuter in person! A must have for a Precious Moments collector.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Heaton

customer_reviews.title: Maybe or maybe not
customer_reviews.text: Cute item, but I had to reglue the photo wire they were all loose and wouldn’t hold up the picture I had.
customer_reviews.author: pebbles

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute candle holder I bought it for my mother in law and she liked it
customer_reviews.author: Johnny and Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute but CHEAP!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with it..I bought 12, 2 were chipped...giving them as hostess gifts...I also bought 6 cheese boards and 6 cheese plates with spreaders also.. some of the plates were chipped and the spreaders blade not attached to handle..don't buy sorry I did..
customer_reviews.author: marjorie ruark

customer_reviews.title: Cookie jar
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet and cute cookie jar. Well made and the design and color are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lee Opitz

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: For the salt and pepper shaker collecter this is a cute addition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but keep your glue gun handy
customer_reviews.text: They looked great on my table, but I had to re-glue the wire in place. Two were loose when I received then (I ordered two box's)
customer_reviews.author: D C Lockard

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and cute.
customer_reviews.text: Cute mug nicely made bought for a gift. Came in a Nice box with styrofoam inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I put coarse kosher salt and coarse pepper in them and it comes out very nicely. There are little rubber dots on the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: This salt and pepper set is too cute. I put coarse kosher salt and coarse pepper in them and it comes out very nicely. There are little rubber dots on the inside of the hat that keeps it from falling. And the bird on the top hat adds a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: cac

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: packaging was a little beat up, considering it was a gift, but item is as pictured and my mom loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: They were really cute but smaller than I thought they would be
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Really cute!
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in perfect condition and will be just what I need to display food labels on my Christmas buffet. Kinda wish I'd bought 2 sets!
customer_reviews.author: mystasmom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully cute bowls. Love how the snowman juts out of the bowl
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B.

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable coffe/tea mug!! I got this for my mom because she loves precious moments and snowmen so much! I’m sure she is going to fall in love with it when she opens it!
customer_reviews.author: Devin T.

customer_reviews.title: Cute coffe cup
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift... great for my hot chocolate!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Galloway

customer_reviews.title: I would suggest to others... The quality of this product was GREAT!!!  I’d buy it again...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when it appeared at my door... very cute... a big hit for the Holidays!! I bought (2) and filled with Holiday Cookies
customer_reviews.author: Becky Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Unique pillar candle holder that you can't find just anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great value and exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Overall the mug is adorable but the bird is more of a brown color ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall the mug is adorable but the bird is more of a brown color and isn’t as perfectly formed as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Packaged well. Bigger than I thought. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, but received with a small noticable chip
customer_reviews.text: Its was a nice set, however, there was a small but noticeable chip on the spreader at the edge of the snowman's hat. There were no ceramic pieces in the box so it seems as if this was chipped prior to being packed. Other than that, it was a cute set.
customer_reviews.author: SONYA C DE LUNA

customer_reviews.title: Suspected used.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how i feel about this item. It was supposed to be a gift for my daughters daycare teacher. The colors are faded and are not as clear and bright as the photo in the listing. The bird has a small chip. And underneath the mug has deep scratches and dirt. Inside looks like there was once liquid inside it with a brown ring along the circle.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: Adorable cookie jar
customer_reviews.text: This jar is manufactured with great detail. It is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn H. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Returning these. One of the three boxes only had three in it instead of four. I needed 12. Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Maria1831

customer_reviews.title: and she loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves snowmen, got this as a Christmas gift, and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: christina norwood

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product was a little larger than I expected but very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The cup was a bit smaller than I hoped, but that was my issue. Overall very nice.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

product_meta.title: Snow Much Fun by Precious Moments Snowman Holiday Décor Ceramic Serving Platter 171473
product_meta.description: Style:Snowman PlatterA smiling snowman in a charming top hat adorned with a red cardinal is sculpted on the front of this generously-sized Precious Moments platter in bold and festive colors. Functional and cheerful, this gift for the kitchen is one that will be used and remembered for years to come. Coordinates perfectly with the other gifts in our Snow Much Fun Collection. Whether used to set out an abundance of cookies or the Christmas ham, it makes the perfect Christmas gift for anyone with an affinity for snowmen and makes a thoughtful hostess gift. Carefully crafted with glazed ceramic and expertly hand painted. Microwave/dishwasher safe. Approximately 13 x 9.5 inches
feature_bullets: A smiling snowman in a charming top hat adorned with a red cardinal is sculpted on the front of this generously-sized ceramic platter in bold and festive colors
Functional and cheerful, this gift for the kitchen is one that will be used and remembered for years to come. Coordinates perfectly with the other gifts in our Snow Much Fun Collection
Whether used to set out an abundance of cookies or the Christmas ham, it makes the perfect Christmas gift for anyone with an affinity for snowmen and makes a thoughtful hostess gift
Carefully crafted with glazed ceramic and expertly hand painted. Microwave/dishwasher safe
